sessions.title: Introduction
subjects: Ice Breaker - Getting to know you
Course overview (Github site for curriculum and assignments), Group Rules, Goals, Expectations
assignments: Goal setting - what do you hope to get out of the program - what kind of job are you looking for?

Prep for Saturday - Create a gmail and google docs account, create a folder to store your assignments named 'Firstname Lastname - Step Up IT' (example: 'Jenny Beaudin - Step Up IT') and share it with the VWW account

sessions.title: Women in IT Panel & Computer Setup
subjects: Computer set-up and installing programs Brackets, Pluralsight, Codecademy, Gmail accounts, Google docs
presentations: 10:30-12:30 - Programming and Logic overview/ice breaker (Karen Walkerman)
1:00-3:00 - Women in IT Panel Discussion & Jobs in IT in Vermont (Robin Lane, Allison Miller, Maureen McElaney, Donna Bepler)
assignments: Look around and familiarize with Pluralsight and Codecademy
Pluralsight module on CSS and HTML
Resumes: Drafts to Jenny by Wednesday

sessions.title: Computer Anatomy
subjects: Computer Anatomy & Terminology: Operating Systems, Software, Malware
Operating Systems: Windows, Mac OS, Linux, Android/iOS
assignments: Resumes: 2nd Draft to Jenny by next class

sessions.title: Resumes and Self Esteem
presentations: 6:30-8:00 - Self Esteem from the Field (Karyn Vogel)
assignments: Codecademy: HTML Basics
Pluralsight HTML & CSS Intro Module

sessions.title: Introduction to HTML (Hypertext Markup Language)
subjects: Introduction to HTML: Tags and Attributes
HTML Document Structure: html, head and body tags
HTML for Content: Headings, Paragraphs, Emphasis, Lists, Links and Images
HTML for Structure: Sections and articles
labs: Exploring HTML source code with Chrome Developer Tools
assignments: Project 1: Complete HTML conversion of Resume content
Pluralsight HTML Intermediate module
Databases Pluralsight Beginner Module

sessions.title: Introduction to Databases & SQL
subjects: Introduction to Relational Databases (RDBMS): Tables and columns
SQL (Structured Query Language): Filtering data based on criteria
Other Datastores: Document Databases (Mongo), Search Engines (Elasticsearch)
assignments: Prep LinkedIn website for next week

sessions.title: Decisionmaking and Problem Solving
subjects: Troubleshooting & Tech Support: Asking the right questions
presentations: 6:30-8:00 Coping Skills: Decisionmaking, Problem Solving (Julie Lerman)
labs: Submitting a clear bug report with steps to reproduce
assignments: HTML Pluralsight Intermediate module
Self esteem assignment

sessions.title: Introduction to CSS (Cascading Style Sheets)
subjects: Introduction to CSS: Properties + Values = Rules
CSS for Typography: Font/text properties, Web fonts, links (hover/visited/hover/active)
labs: Attaching a stylesheet with the link tag
Exploring CSS styles with Chrome Developer Tools
assignments: Project 1: Apply CSS styling to Resume

sessions.title: Online Etiquette and Social Media
subjects: Email etiquette, cleaning up social media, resume review
assignments: Work on LinkedIn account updates

sessions.title: Image Manipulation & Photoshop
subjects: Optimizing Images for the web and print
Raster Image Formats: JPG and PNG
Vector Image Formats: EPS and SVG
assignments: Pluralsight module: Intermediate CSS

sessions.title: HTML & CSS for Layout
subjects: HTML Tags for Layout: div, header, footer, nav and main
CSS: Floats for Multi Column Layout
labs: Utility classes for content images (left, right, center)
Create a three column layout of 3 products with images floats
Create a fixed header with positioning
Add product titles with relative and absolute positioning
assignments: Project 2: Complete HTML for Site Layout

sessions.title: Version Control with Git
subjects: Introduction to Git: Staging and commiting changes
Introduction to Github: Adding a remote and pushing your changes

sessions.title: Introduction to jQuery
subjects: jQuery: The Javascript Utility Belt for the Browser
jQuery: Finding HTML tags using CSS Selectors
jQuery: Responding to User Input with Events
labs: Debugging css selectors using jQuery and the developer toolbar
Adding jQuery to an HTML page
Creating a slideshow using jquery plugins
assignments: Project 2: Complete application of CSS to HTML for Site Layout

sessions.title: Networking, Giving & Receiving Feedback
presentations: 6:00-7:00 Girl Develop It and Networking (Maureen McElaney)
assignments: Pluralsight on CSS background images and effects

sessions.title: Cover Letters
assignments: Pluralsight on JQuery
Work on Cover Letters

sessions.title: Introduction to Javascript
subjects: Introduction to Javascript: Adding behavior to web sites
labs: Exploring javascript with the Web Developer toolbar
assignments: Project 3: Collect and resize thumbnails and large versions of 10 images along with captions for photo gallery.
Project 3: Create HTML page with all thumbnail images linked to large versions and with a title attribute on the links

sessions.title: Javascript Continued
assignments: Project 3: Add CSS Styling and jQuery Lightbox plugin to open large images in an overlay with a caption when the thumbnails are clicked

sessions.title: Launching a Website: Domains, Hosting & FTP
subjects: Connecting Domains to a Hosting Account: DNS Servers
Uploading website files using FTP: Web root
presentations: 6:00-8:00 Launching a website: Domains, Hosting and FTP
labs: Using FTP to transfer files to a hosting account

sessions.title: Content Management Systems & Wordpress
labs: Creation and modification of a theme
